title: These Fisherman Sandals Are the Key to Perfecting Nautical Style for Spring
description: The controversial dad shoe has never looked so chic.
excerpt: Shop spring/summer 2025's best fisherman sandals from Prada, The Row, Sézane, Everlane and other top brands. The controversial dad shoe never looked so chic!
text: The Comfortable ClassicG.H. Bass Fisherman SandalFor a modern take on the classic, try these sleek G.H. Bass fisherman sandals. The wide, interwoven leather straps don’t just lend a minimalist feel; they also make the walkable style even more comfortable. With time, they’ll stretch in all the right places and mold to your unique foot shape. Sizes: 5-11Colors: Black, Off-White, TanMaterials: Leather upper, leather soleCustomer review: “Well worth the price. html:
The Comfortable Classic

G.H. Bass Fisherman Sandal

For a modern take on the classic, try these sleek G.H. Bass fisherman sandals. The wide, interwoven leather straps don’t just lend a minimalist feel; they also make the walkable style even more comfortable. With time, they’ll stretch in all the right places and mold to your unique foot shape.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Black, Off-White, Tan

Materials: Leather upper, leather sole

Customer review: “Well worth the price. They’ve been crafted well, the leather feels like good quality, and they are comfortable off the bat without having to break them in.”

The Designer Standout

Prada Calf Leather Fisherman Sandals

Prada’s signature triangle logo adds a subtle air of luxury to this otherwise traditional fisherman style. Crafted in Italy from high-quality calf leather, it’s the type of shoe that only gets better as the years go by.

Sizes: EU 36-41

Colors: Nero, Bianco

Materials: Leather upper, leather sole

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Suede Selection

JW Anderson Suede Fisherman Sandals

Tactile, sage green suede and a slingback silhouette give these JW Anderson sandals an easy-going feel. Contrast stitching and low-key logo embossing add a certain je ne sais quoi you’ll long to wear again and again.

Sizes: IT 35-42

Colors: Sage Green

Materials: Suede

The Fisherman Slide

Franco Sarto Tavana Fisherman Sandal

You’ll notice fisherman sandal-like straps on many of this season’s slides and mules, too. The T-shaped interwoven design of this Franco Sarto style gives a nod to the nautical silhouette without going full-on granola. And, at a price that’s hard to resist.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Black, Acorn Brown, Gold, Silver

Materials: Leather upper, rubber sole

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Streamlined Silhouette

Everlane The Day Fisherman Sandal

A soft suede finish makes these Everlane fisherman sandals even easier to pair with slouchy socks on colder days. Consider this saddle brown colorway one of this year’s transitional weather essentials.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Black Leather, Rum Leather, Saddle Brown Suede, Canvas leather

Materials: Suede

Customer review: “I love that they have a more feminine feel as opposed to the chunkier, heavier versions. The small heel helps to elevate the shoe (literally and figuratively). The suede is icing on the top.”

The Elevated Everyday Pair

Tory Burch Kira Sport Fisherman Sandal

Tory Burch’s take on the nautical favorite pairs wide velcro straps with a chunky molded leather footbed for an elevated yet sporty end result. A metal logo stamped on the side modestly highlights your exceptional taste in shoes.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: Black, White

Materials: Leather

Customer review: “Works great with so many different outfits. I can wear them with or without socks.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Studded Boho Sandal

Freda Salvador Sera Fisherman Sandal

Lean into the boho aesthetic with these elegant, metal-accented suede fisherman sandals from Freda Salvador. If studs aren’t quite your speed, snag the popular silhouette in one of the numerous other leather, suede, and raffia finishes before they inevitably sell out.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: 17 options

Materials: Leather

The Heeled Fisherman Sandal

Sézane Florie Sandals

For a fresh take on the silhouette, try a pair of heeled fisherman sandals that you can pair with summer skirts and dresses. This patent-leather style from Sézane has a 2.8-inch heel and sturdy straps that will help you dance the night away.

Sizes: 4-11

Colors: Patent Camel, Patent Navy

Materials: Goatskin leather, cowhide leather, rubber

The Contemporary Pick

Camper Dana Fisherman Sandal

The straps of these Camper fisherman sandals are so wide that the shoe feels more akin to a cut-out loafer than a true sandal. With some wise styling and a cozy pair of wool socks, the square-toed style can be worn any time of year.

Sizes: EU 35-41

Colors: Black

Materials: Leather

Customer review: “Took no time to break in. I brought them on my 2-week trip to Japan and walked over 15K steps each day. No blister, no pain.”

The Timeless Travel Shoe

Mansur Gavriel Fisherman Sandal

Fashioned with a simple (and ultra-comfortable) silhouette that can easily be dressed up or down, these Mansur Gavriel fisherman sandals are practically begging you to take them on vacation.

Sizes: EU 35-41

Colors: Black, Chocolate, Jasmine, Cammello

Materials: Calf leather upper, lambskin leather lining

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The It-Brand's Offering

The Row Fisherman Leather Sandals

It feels like anything and everything the Olsen twins dream up at The Row becomes a trend, and fisherman sandals are the perfect example. Expect chunky, flatform silhouettes like this to be popular with the quiet luxury crowd this summer.

Sizes: EU 35-42

Colors: Black, Off-White

Materials: Leather upper, rubber sole

The Grown-Up Jelly Shoe

Vince Melina Jelly Sandals

Revisit a childhood favorite with these transparent fisherman sandals from Vince. The sleek silhouette and sepia-brown colorway give the style a distinctly grown-up feel.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Bright Sap Brown, Clear

Materials: Polyurethane upper, leather lining and sole

Customer review: “Great quality and very comfortable. Worth the price.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Artisanal Option

Ancient Greek Sandals Cosmia Leather Sandals

These caged Cosmia slides from Ancient Greek Sandals pay homage to old-school fisherman sandals without resembling a dad shoe in the slightest. The adjustable top strap helps create a secure, comfortable fit you can walk (or stroll the beach) in for miles.

Sizes: EU 35-42

Colors: Black, Off-White, Platinum, Natural

Materials: Leather

The Crafty Vacation Shoe

Loeffler Randall Sawyer Natural Crochet Caged Sandal

Woven from crochet raffia, these Loeffler Randall fisherman sandals fully embrace the style’s beachside origins. With summer right around the corner, why not grab them while they’re more than half off?

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: Natural

Materials: Crocheted raffia upper, leather sole

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Almost Mary-Jane

Hereu Pesca Sandals

The cut-out, T-bar silhouette of these Hereu sandals toes the line between a fisherman sandal and a Mary Jane, two of spring’s most popular styles. The brand also offers the buzzy style with a 2-inch block heel.

Sizes: IT 35-42

Colors: Black, Beige

Materials: Calfskin, suede lining, rubber-injected sole

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
